M3 iPad Air 11″ and 13″ – Up to $70 Off

The newest model iPad Air includes the M3 chip with Apple Intelligence support, Liquid Retina LCD display, 128GB storage, 12MP front and rear camera, Touch ID on the power button, great battery life, support for Apple Pencil Pro, and is available in a variety of color options.

  • M3 iPad Air 11″ – $549 (down from $599 retail)
  • M3 iPad Air 13″ – $729 (down from $799)

M4 MacBook Air – Up to $150 Off

You can save up to $150 off the retail price of brand new MacBook Air models, in various color options and with either the 13″ or 15″ display size. The new MacBook Air features an M4 chip with Apple Intelligence support, a Liquid Retina LCD display that is nearly flicker-free (this is very important for those sensitive to PWM), 12MP camera with Center Stage, Touch ID, a backlit keyboard, all-day battery life, support for dual displays, and more. Check out the various display sizes, colors, RAM, and storage configurations, to find the model perfect for you and your needs. Why pay the Apple retail price when you don’t have to?
